title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification
description: Label font size doesn't change right away when modified.
OB: The height of the label does not change immediately after modifying the label font in the UI.
EB: The label height should change to adjust with the font size when the label content is modified.
SR:
1. Open the UI where the label is displayed. 
2. Modify the font size of the label. 
3. Change the content of the label and observe if the label height is justified with the font size.
